Improvements.Improvement: Use constant string values for property keys
Improvements.Description: Instead of using raw strings as keys when retrieving properties, define them as constant variables. This promotes reusability and reduces the chance of errors due to typos.

Improvements.Improvement: Encapsulate property loading in separate method
Improvements.Description: The constructor is doing too much work right now. It would be better to encapsulate the property loading into a separate method to enhance readability and maintainability.

Improvements.Improvement: Encapsulate SSL context building in separate method
Improvements.Description: Similarly, SSL context building is a process that could be encapsulated into its own function to enhance readability and maintainability.
